Dimitar,

Patch processing has been slow on JUnit, as I shared with the lis=
t
that my paid work and family commitments have been taking up more of
my t=
ime over the last few months than before.  I hope you do find a
solution th=
at works for you, whether it involves the overhead of
freely reusing others=
' efforts or of writing your own.

   David Saff
